description: Specifies the kind of economic or environmental resource. Could define a material or digital thing, service, medium of exchange or currency, skill or type of work.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the resource specification.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the resource specification.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the resource specification.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for categorization.

imageList.description: URIs to images relevant to the resource specification.

defaultUnitOfResource.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.unit record for the default unit.

defaultUnitOfEffort.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.unit record for the default effort unit.

substitutable.description: Defines if any resource of this type can be freely substituted for another of the same type.

mediumOfExchange.description: True if the resource is a currency, money, token, credit, etc.
